DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study analyze 13-valent pneumococcal vaccine give healthy infant Brazil safety tolerability , determine immune response vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Healthy Infants Brazil
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy 1 month old infant Available duration study reachable telephone Able complete two blood drawing procedure study Exclusion criterion : Previous vaccination , contraindication history allergic reaction vaccine vaccine component Bleeding disorder , immune deficiency significant chronic congenital disease Previous receipt blood product immune globulin
